Row.Text: In 1540, Feudal Japan has plunged into a massive civil war as rival warlords seek total control of Japan. Are you able to become Japan's next Shogun?
Become Shogun by capturing and holding Kyoto.
Capture and hold 40% of victory-eligible land in Japan.

SCENARIO DESCRIPTION[NEWLINE]The year is 1540. Once-unified Japan has fractured into numerous warring factions, led by powerful warlords who seek to become the Shogun and force their rivals to bow before them. It is a time of unprecedented upheaval and opportunity, where the clash of steel echoes across the land, the scent of gunpowder fills the air, and the dreams of countless daimyo fuel the fires of ambition. Are you ready to become the Shogun of Japan?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]VICTORY CONDITIONS[NEWLINE]You must achieve the following objectives before Winter, 1600 AD in order to win the scenario:[NEWLINE][TAB][ICON_BULLET]{TXT_KEY_SENGOKU_SCENARIO_VICTORY_CONDITION_1}[NEWLINE][TAB][ICON_BULLET]{TXT_KEY_SENGOKU_SCENARIO_VICTORY_CONDITION_2}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]SPECIAL RULES[NEWLINE]This scenario features a reworked tech tree, new Religions, Units, Buildings, and Social Policies. Three religions have been founded at the start of the game: [ICON_RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY] Christianity, [ICON_RELIGION_SHINTO] Shinto, and [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism. These religions have powerful effects so be sure to prioritze your [ICON_PEACE] Faith generation and economy!

You can only unify Japan by achieving the following two conditions before the game ends (end of turn Winter, 1600 AD). Your clan must control the city of Kyoto, and you or your vassals must own 40% of all eligible land.
Eligible land for victory are all tiles that are not Tundra, Snow, Coast, or Ocean, and must be on a landmass that has at least 5 tiles.
We have captured Kyoto and can now be recognized as the Shogun! Continue to conquer the rest of Japan and force the other clans to surrender to our might!
Kyoto has been captured by {@1_CivName}, and they can now be recognized as the Shogun! We must act quickly to prevent them from dominating Japan!

A [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu rebellion has started in {@1_CityName}! This City will experience negative effects until less than 33% of the citizens follow [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism.
The Jodo Shinshu Rebellion has ended in {@1_CityName}!

The Jodo Shinshu rebellion in {@1_CityName} has gotten stronger! This City will continue to experience negative effects until you reduce the number of [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism followers.

The Jodo Shinshu rebellion in {@1_CityName} has gotten weaker! Continue to reduce the number of [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism followers to reduce the negative effects on your cities.

The Ikko-Ikki clan has adopted the [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{@1_PolicyName}[ENDCOLOR] Social Policy in the Uprising Social Policy Branch.
